Class NotificationsPreference

java.lang.Object
  org.jivesoftware.sparkimpl.preference.notifications.NotificationsPreference
All Implemented Interfaces:
Preference
public class NotificationsPreference
extends java.lang.Object
implements Preference

Handles the preferences for notification behavior within the Spark IM Client.

Author:
Derek DeMoro
